name: In Tune(Mix and Game Jam)
description: My second Game Jam project. I started learning Unity and C# on September 25th of this year. So only a couple months of learning lol. Josh, Popo and I teamed up to create a platforming game where you avoid enemies and solve puzzles by jumping on the right platforms. I wasn't able to complete our vision but this is what was completed in the 48 hours. Hope you like it!
